name: Inkling
description: The Inkling is a tiny construct characterized by its agility and magical capabilities, typically appearing as a small, amorphous blob adept at stealth.
memorable: It can learn spells and redirect incoming spells, making it a clever and elusive creature.
goals: To study and absorb magical knowledge, often in a stealthy manner.
relations: Often linked to spellcasters or creators who utilize constructs.
environment: Usually found in magical laboratories or locations rich in arcane knowledge.
strengths: Highly agile and has exceptional mobility, with abilities to resist magic and learn spells.
weaknesses: Low physical strength and fragility; vulnerable to specific constructs-related attacks.
attacks: Uses a melee attack called Lash that inflicts slashing damage upon a successful hit.
most_powerful_ability: Redirect Spell, allowing it to redirect spells targeting it to another creature.
senses: Possesses blindsight out to 60 feet, allowing it to be aware of surroundings without sight.
skills: Skilled in Arcana and Stealth, making it capable of recognizing magical phenomena and remaining undetected.
additional_information: Amorphous ability allows it to move through tight spaces easily.
Can innately cast various spells for utility and attack.
Capable of learning spells through study, increasing its versatility.
spellcasting: Innate spellcaster with several spells available at will and once per day.
test_queries: tiny magical construct skilled in stealth
creature that can redirect spells at targets
tiny creature with blindsight and spellcasting abilities
